allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add WordPress plugin starter structure

- Created main plugin file with proper WordPress headers
- Set up Composer with PSR-4 autoloading for AB\BricksAutoToken namespace
- Created main Plugin class with dependency checks
- Added directory structure for includes, integrations, assets, and languages
- Added comprehensive README.md and .gitignore

Bash(powershell -Command "Add-Type -Assembly System.IO.Compression.FileSystem; $zip = [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::OpenRead(''plugin/ab-bricks-auto-token-1.0.0.zip''); Write-Host ''Total files:'' $zip.Entries.Count; Write-Host ''''; Write-Host ''PHP files:''; $zip.Entries | Where-Object { $_Name -like ''*.php'' } | Select-Object -ExpandProperty FullName")
